title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping, 2-Pack

Sleep cooler, comfier, and better supported. This set of two COZSINOOR Queen pillows combines breathable, skin-friendly materials with plush support that adapts to back, stomach, and side sleepers alike.

Key Features:
- Cooling comfort: Airy, breathable design helps dissipate heat for a cooler night’s sleep.
- Plush down-alternative feel: Filled with premium hollow fiber for a soft, cloud-like loft without the allergens of down.
- Consistent support: No-shift construction and shape-retaining fill provide reliable neck and head support throughout the night.
- Skin-friendly cover: Smooth polyester-blend shell feels gentle against the skin and enhances airflow.
- Versatile for all sleepers: Balanced plushness and support ideal for back, side, and stomach sleepers.

Quality & Materials:
- Size: Queen
- Quantity: 2 pillows
- Fill: Down alternative hollow microfiber
- Cover: Polyester blend
- Hypoallergenic, breathable, and supportive

Care Instructions:
- Machine washable: Wash at 30°C (cold/gentle cycle recommended).
- Tumble dry: Low setting.
- Easy maintenance to keep pillows fresh and fluffy.

Packaging & Setup:
- Ships vacuum-packed for convenience and hygiene.
- Allow 24 hours after opening for full expansion and optimal loft.

Why You’ll Love It:
- Cooling breathability meets plush comfort for deeper rest.
- Durable construction that holds its shape night after night.
- Easy-care design that’s machine washable and dryer-friendly.

Upgrade your sleep with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows—plush, supportive, and refreshingly cool, night after night.
